summary: A small set of chain mail designed for Kevin VanNord after last weeks episode of gamespot top 5 Skyrim mods of the week.
descriptionHtml:
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=4][COLOR=#4f6128][U][B]The Kevin VanNord Chainmail[/B][/U][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=4][COLOR=#4f6128]After I watched the gamespot top 5 Skyrim mods of the week episode yesterday I decided to complete Cam and Seb's request for the Kevin VanNord Armor. I followed the picture as closely as I could for the almighty god that is Kevin VanNord![/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][COLOR=#4f6128][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][/FONT][/COLOR]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=4][COLOR=#4f6128]
[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=4][COLOR=#4f6128]I used this modders resource for the chailmail: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7267/?[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=4][COLOR=#4f6128]
[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=4][COLOR=#4f6128]Credits:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=4][COLOR=#4f6128]Bethesda[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[COLOR=#4f6128][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=4][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3820284/?]Moveing[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#4f6128][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=4]Enjoy [/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][IMG]http://www.ecardmax.com/hoteditor/smileys/YahooIM/15.gif" style="cursor: pointer;[/IMG]
author: MJAB98
